properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 7:07PM CST by NWS Bismarck ND
properties.description:
Weather radars show a band of light snow or light freezing rain
developing east into south central North Dakota early Saturday
evening. With road surface temperatures below freezing, ice
accumulations on roadways are likely.

The wintry mix extended from near Golden Valley south through far
western Grant and Sioux counties. Interstate 94 between Hebron
and Mandan will be impacted. along with other locations such as
Center, Elgin, Carson, Flasher, Selfridge, and Fort Yates.

Roads and sidewalks will become slippery. Use extra caution and
slow down. Allow for longer braking distances.

NWSheadline: WINTRY MIX OF SNOW OR LIGHT FREEZING RAIN MOVING INTO SOUTH CENTRAL NORTH DAKOTA EARLY THIS EVENING
